workshoptitle: Oracle Enterprise Manager - Database Migration Workbench

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Database Migration Workbench Workshop

tutorials.title: Get Started with noVNC Remote Desktop
Lab 1: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Migrate and upgrade 12c database to 19c PDB
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Database Migration Workbench features in Oracle Enterprise Manager 13.5 RU7. It is intended to familiarize you with this tool which can be invaluable in your journey to 19c and multitenant

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Migrate and upgrade 12c database to 19c in new destination
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Migration Workbench features in Oracle Enterprise Manager 13.5 RU7. It is intended to familiarize you with this tool which can be invaluable in your journey to 19c and multitenant

tutorials.title: Lab 4 (Optional): Migrate and upgrade 12c database to 19c ADB
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Migration Workbench features in Oracle Enterprise Manager 13.5 RU7. It is intended to familiarize you with this tool which can be invaluable in your journey to 19c and multitenant

tutorials.title: Appendix: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
tutorials.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) you may refer to when troubleshooting issues encountered while executing above labs

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
